title: MPLP Confirm Module – Core Protocol v1.0
description: Confirm Module Core Protocol: Describes the minimal required semantics (Core Profile) for approval requests and decision records.

meta.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] MPLP protocol schema metadata (version, source, cross-cutting tags, etc.).

governance.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Governance metadata for lifecycle management, truth domain authority, and locking status.

lifecyclePhase.description: Current phase in the lifecycle fence (e.g., 'design', 'implementation', 'review').

truthDomain.description: The truth domain this object belongs to (e.g., 'requirements', 'architecture').

locked.description: If true, this object cannot be modified except by specific governance overrides.

lastConfirmRef.description: Reference to the last Confirm decision that validated this state.

confirm_id.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Global unique identifier for the approval request.

target_type.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Approval target type (type of the resource being approved).

target_id.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Global unique identifier of the resource being approved.

status.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Current status of the approval request.

requested_by_role.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Identifier of the role initiating the approval request (should correspond to role_id in Role module).

reason.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Reason for the request, for humans and Agents.

decisions.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] List of decision records related to this Confirm request.

trace.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] Trace reference bound to this Confirm request (for cross-module tracing).

events.description: [PROTOCOL-CORE] List of key events directly related to this Confirm request (creation, decision, cancellation, etc.).
